summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2700, for the improvement of Dexter Avenue, from Harrison Street to the intersection of 4th Avenue North, Nickerson Street and Westlake Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same for a width of 16 feet, under Ordinance No. 31710 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
